page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: {TRANSPORT The only buses from Glass into town are those of Jack Keir and they come about 3 times a day so the transport into Huntly is bad unless a car is owned.The traffic on the B_road is heavy because of large Distillery lorries and sheep floats. { {QUESTION Q.What is the traffic like on the road? A.Far too fast and dangerous for dogs and children. Many people have cars.The produce is transported by lorry e.g. Potatoes,sold locally Barley,to Peterhead Fish transported by freezer lorry. Sheep and cattle weekly by float to Huntly mart which is well attended by local farmers.
